content.question: Which of the following was the immediate cause of the revolutions that occurred in several major European cities in 1848 ?

choices.label: The worker demonstrations in St. Petersburg against the tsar
The dissolution of the Prussian assembly by Otto von Bismarck
Food shortages in Great Britain resulting from the Com Laws
The overthrow of Louis-Philippe of France

content.answer: The overthrow of Louis-Philippe of France

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
